actionable_tasks.title: Frontend UI Completion: Spotify Authentication Interface
actionable_tasks.description: Implement and finalize the Spotify OAuth authentication UI, ensuring users can log in and authorize the app for playlist creation and streaming. This involves connecting the frontend to the existing backend OAuth endpoints and providing clear user feedback on authentication status.
implementation_steps: Review backend Spotify OAuth endpoints for expected request/response.
Design and implement the login button and authentication flow in the UI.
Handle OAuth redirects and token storage securely in the frontend.
Display authentication status and error messages to the user.
Test the flow with valid and invalid credentials.

actionable_tasks.title: Fix Unused Variables in High-Change Backend Modules
actionable_tasks.description: Perform a targeted cleanup of unused variables in backend modules with high change rates, such as API routes and chat handlers, to improve maintainability and reduce potential bugs.
implementation_steps: Run ESLint with the unused-vars rule on the specified directories.
Remove or refactor unused variable declarations and imports.
Rerun tests to ensure no regressions.
Commit changes with clear messages referencing code quality improvements.

actionable_tasks.title: Expand Automated Test Coverage for MCP Endpoints
actionable_tasks.description: Increase automated test coverage for MCP (Multi-Provider) endpoints, focusing on provider health and switching logic. This will improve reliability and catch regressions early.
implementation_steps: Identify untested MCP endpoint logic (health checks, provider switching).
Write new Jest test cases for edge cases and error handling.
Run the test suite and ensure all tests pass.
Document new tests in the test coverage report.

actionable_tasks.title: Add Docker Compose for Local Development
actionable_tasks.description: Create a simple Docker Compose file to orchestrate the Node backend, React frontend, and MCP servers for streamlined local development and testing.
implementation_steps: Draft a docker-compose.yml with services for backend, frontend, and MCP servers.
Reference existing Dockerfiles or create minimal ones if missing.
Test local startup and inter-service communication.
Update README with usage instructions.

actionable_tasks.title: Add Quality Maintenance Scripts to package.json
actionable_tasks.description: Ensure that lint, security audit, and quality check scripts are present and correctly configured in package.json for ongoing code health.
implementation_steps: Verify presence of 'lint', 'security:audit', and 'quality:check' scripts.
Add or update scripts to use ESLint, npm audit, and any custom quality checks.
Test scripts locally and document usage in package.json comments.
